content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

Looks solid!

Are there any ways to reset brightness/contrast to their default? I imagine *eventually* someone will set a slider to 0 and be unable to set it back. I've done this with the brightness slider on my laptop display a few times, but it resets when I restart (and I can boot into a terminal). I guess I'm also curious where the custom styles are stored as well...
